about:
In my artworks I adhere to internal realism. I find in bright coloring art that really excites me. I find inspiration in momentary associations like a real musical improvisation, but on canvas.
  When I saw artworks of Joan Miro, Shagal and Kandinsky, I realy heard how they sound. This inspired me to find treasure internally my mind and to remove many restrictions.

about: I have been a designer for 8 years, initially I stood out in areas such as print creation, WordPress pages, animation. When I went out to work I began to work in an NGO for 3 years, in that I was in charge of doing branding, make printed material. Then I went to work with several international design studios for 4 years where I worked as an Art Director, this led me to fall more in love with branding and illustration, currently I am working only as a freelance.

No mais, sou um libriano tranquilo com ascendência em empolgação criativa.

about:
Welcome to my profile. My name is Szekeres László and I'm a graphic designer, with many years of experience. I live in the beautiful city of Oradea, Romania, with my even more beautiful wife, Henrietta:). My "designer career" started when I was 4 and I drew tons of cows and horses..^^ Since then I developed my ability, until graphic design became my passion and my job as well.
  If you like my works and you are interested in logo or stationary design, feel free to contact me.

about:
I have been working in advertising agencies more than 13 years as a graphic designer.

about: Hi, my name is Francesco Saviano. The computer graphics and photography are my world. I love what I do and I'm always looking for new trends and inspirations for my creations. I use Photoshop to create modern website templates and book covers. I use Illustrator to create awesome logos. My background also   includes basic knowledge of the Blender 3D modeling software. I have intermediate knowledge of 3d Texturing. My job is my greatest passion. In my free time I paint in oil.

about: I am a graphic designer who was born and raised in mountainous area Central Java, Indonesia. I attribute my creative roots from living around the beautiful city there. In my career I’ve had the privilege to work in many different industries and for private clients. I usually use adobe suite products like Photoshop, and Illustrator. I love exploring new styles and techniques to suit the clients needs. I’m a digital nomad at the moment and have been country hopping since 2014.

about: I would love to work 1-on-1 with you to create the perfect design to fit your company! Feel free to get in touch with me and ask any questions. I am a stay at home mom who love's to design in my spare time! Being a self taught graphic designer, I don't know all techniques, but it is so fun learning and expanding my knowledge everyday. I will work diligently to make a logo exactly what you want. Your satisfaction is very important to me!

about: I am a graphic designer and illustrator based in İstanbul, specializing in logo design, corporate identity systems, packaging, publication design as well as digital media. I have a BA degree from the Industrial Design Department, METU and an MA from Marmara University Graphic Design Department. I was TA at M.U. for 10 years. During my post-graduate studies and ever since, I worked as a graphic designer in several firms in İstanbul. I founded my own studio in 2018. www.evrenkayhan.com

about:
Designer from Ukraine.
  37 years
  Since 2009 I have been working as a freelance graphic designer.
  In my work I am guided by the main rule: "originality and practicality".
  Design should speak for itself. I do not use overused-overdone concepts, clipart’s or stock images at my work, except the customer request (within copyright).

about: Hey!  I'm Artmin, I am a Graphic Designer specializing in Illustrations and identity design. I've been exploring and experimenting with creative art since I was a child. I enjoy new and challenging projects that push and challenge me to evolve and learn in the field of design. I've had a lot of exposure in the field of design and have been working professionally for the past 6 years. I create clean, fun and appealing designs which comply with the latest design standards.
